app.title: Supplementary Materials
app.p: The following are available online at https://www.mdpi.com/1999-4915/12/3/331/s1, Figure S1: Markov Chain Monte Carlo (MCMC) simulation trajectories for estimated transmission flows within/between populations after adjusting for sampling heterogeneity, Table S1: Mean pairwise distances in phylogenetically reconstructed transmission networks, Table S2: Phylogenetically reconstructed sourceâ€“recipient pairs by location and gender.
